features: PRESCRIPTION-STRENGTH WETNESS PROTECTION: Active lives need Degree Clinical Protection 5-in-1 Antiperspirant Deodorant. This antiperspirant delivers 72-hour sweat and odor protection
YOU MOVE, IT WORKS: Our breakthrough MotionSense technology works in sync with your body, all day long. This antiperspirant for women releases a burst of fragrance every time you move
READY FOR WHAT’S NEXT: Take on the day with Degree Clinical Protection 5-in-1 Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick. Simply twist, glide, and move with confidence
ALL-DAY FRESHNESS: This antiperspirant features a clean and refreshing scent to keep you feeling fresh and active all day long
RECYCLE WITH DEGREE: As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging
GO BEYOND YOUR LIMITS: At Degree, we want to inspire the confidence in everyone to move more and go further. We’re here to support your journey through an antiperspirant that moves with you
body.description: Degree Women Clinical Protection 5-in-1 Antiperspirant Deodorant delivers prescription-strength wetness protection, so you can face the day with confidence. This antiperspirant for women offers 5 benefits including odor control, a refreshing fragrance, instant moisturization, wetness protection, and quick absorption. Made with a unique blend of skin moisturizing ingredients, this antiperspirant delivers long-lasting 72-hour sweat and odor protection. Only Degree has MotionSense technology that moves in sync with your body. With long-lasting and strong yet gentle protection, even against sweat caused by stress, this antiperspirant keeps you dry for up to 72 hours. This powerful antiperspirant deodorant responds when you need it most so that you don't have to worry about slowing down, giving you the confidence to keep moving, however you move. Simply swipe and start moving. At Degree, we want to inspire the confidence in everyone to move more and go further. We’re here to support your journey through an antiperspirant that moves with you and helps you go beyond your limits. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging. Degree. It won’t let you down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Degree Women Clinical Protection 5-in-1 Antiperspirant Deodorant keeps excessive sweating under control, keeping you in the game with a clean, feminine scent. However you move, move with the confidence of 72-hour sweat protection from Degree.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This clinical antiperspirant deodorant delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Degree's breakthrough MotionSense technology reacts directly to movement to keep you feeling fresh and protected. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD REUSED At Degree, we're committed to creating the most reused and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we're making it easier for you to reuse our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Clinical Protection Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant, 1.7 oz Degree Clinical Protection Summer Strength Antiperspirant Deodorant, 1.7 oz Degree Clinical Protection Stress Control Antiperspirant Deodorant, 1.7 oz Main Benefit This antiperspirant deodorant with MotionSense Technology keeps excessive sweating under control, no matter how much you move. Degree Clinical Protection Summer Strength Antiperspirant Deodorant features our breakthrough MotionSense Technology that doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. Degree Clinical Protection Stress Control Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick for women keeps you feeling fresh with 72-hour sweat and odor protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best deodorant I’ve ever used
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many deodorants over the years, some that smell good but don’t last, some smell bad but work, and others that just end up more on your clothes than on your armpits. This one is not any of that. It smells amazing, keeps your underarms feeling clean, dry and does not get all over your clothes. Finally found my forever deodorant!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super great deodorant!!! smells awesome and works
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is my go to deodorant for like 10 years, and I love the smell and feel. Even though it’s a cream, it really doesn’t smear and spread very much on clothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff work.
reviews.reviewText: They say 72 hrs it's true. The smell is nice too. Not over welming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Effective for body odor
reviews.reviewText: The best deodorant I have used so far for my BO. For some reason, no deodorant worked for my BO, until I tried this. One application can last me the whole day without having to reapply. If you are struggling with BO like I was, definitely give this a try.

reviews.reviewerName: A a name I call myself
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well, did not live the smell!
reviews.reviewText: The smell was not my favorite.....however degree clinical strength works very well on the funk when those gremlins are attacking. I swear they need to stop product testing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorites!
reviews.reviewText: Really good for sweat, lasts over the course of the day beautifully! Reordered many times!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with this product.
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this deodorant effective .. no under arm irritation!
Decent product but milk of magnesia does a better job than is deo. It does stain clothes.
